author: Laura Hoy
title: The Unlikely Coronavirus Treatment No One Talks About
description: The highly publicized coronavirus treatments may not be as effective as simple solutions like vitamin C and a healthy lifestyle. The post The Unlikely Coronavirus Treatment No One Talks About appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• New York hospitals have had success using vitamin C to treat coronavirus.
  • Similar results were seen in Wuhan.
  • Data show that healthy lifestyle choices could be the best way to avoid severe coronavirus cases.
